reference_a:
@article{ryvkina2023,
  title = {Understanding psychological responses to the {{COVID-19}} pandemic through {{ESM}} data: {{The EMOTIONS}} project},
  shorttitle = {Understanding psychological responses to the {{COVID-19}} pandemic through {{ESM}} data},
  author = {Ryvkina, Elina and Kroencke, Lara and Geukes, Katharina and Scharbert, Julian and Back, Mitja D.},
  date = {2023-04-10T13:36:31+00:00},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Open Psychology Data},
  volume = {11},
  number = {1},
  issn = {2050-9863},
  doi = {10.5334/jopd.83}
}
reference_b:
@article{kroencke2023,
  title = {Narcissistic status pursuit in everyday social life: {{A}} within-person process approach to the behavioral and emotional dynamics of narcissism},
  shorttitle = {Narcissistic status pursuit in everyday social life},
  author = {Kroencke, Lara and Kuper, Niclas and Mota, Simon and Geukes, Katharina and Zeigler-Hill, Virgil and Back, Mitja D.},
  date = {2023-12},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Personality and Social Psychology},
  shortjournal = {Journal of Personality and Social Psychology},
  volume = {125},
  number = {6},
  pages = {1519--1541},
  issn = {1939-1315, 0022-3514},
  doi = {10.1037/pspp0000467}
}
topics: COVID, personality, emotions, affect, interaction, activities
sampling_scheme: 6x/day at random times within the bounds of every participant's individually preferred time window, with at least 40 min. time lags between surveys
additional_comments: sample 1 in the paper, EMOTIONS project, subset of data used in a publication is available at https://osf.io/nxyh3/files/osfstorage, some COVID-related variables were only assessed for part of the sample, original dataset contains additional careless responding indices that could be recomputed from the data, no beep information available

features.name: beep
features.coding: not available

features.name: wave
features.coding: Indicates which waves (of wave 1 and wave 2, or both) a participant participated in

features.name: dataset
features.coding: Indicates which raw dataset a participant was included in. Can be S1W1 or S1W2 for either wave dataset

features.name: interaction
features.coding:
Since the last survey, I (at least) had one social 
interaction that lasted longer than 5 minutes.
1 = Yes
2 = No

features.name: type_interaction
features.coding:
If Interaction = Yes, the following questions (until int_activity) are posed.
Now please answer a few questions about your last social interaction, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you interacted with one or more other people.
During what type of activity did the interaction take place?
1 = job-related task/chore
2 = private task/chore
3 = leisure activity

features.name: communication
features.coding:
The interaction evaluated here took place as follows:
1 = directly/in person
2 = via phone/chat

features.name: no_interactionpartner
features.coding:
How many people other than you were involved in the interaction? Please enter 5 if you interacted with more than 5 people. In this case, please refer below to the five people with whom you interacted the most.
Answer options = 1-5

features.name: interaction_partner1
features.coding:
This interaction partner in the situation has the following relationship to me:
Select one: 1 (Supervisor); 2 (My employee); 3 (Co-worker); 4 (Customer client patient); 5 (Friend / acquaintance); 6 (Partner); 7 (My child); 8 (Parent); 9 (Sibling); 10 (other relatives); 11 (other persons)

features.name: interaction_partner2
features.coding:
This interaction partner in the situation has the following relationship to me:
Select one: 1 (Supervisor); 2 (My employee); 3 (Co-worker); 4 (Customer client patient); 5 (Friend / acquaintance); 6 (Partner); 7 (My child); 8 (Parent); 9 (Sibling); 10 (other relatives); 11 (other persons)

features.name: interaction_partner3
features.coding:
This interaction partner in the situation has the following relationship to me:
Select one: 1 (Supervisor); 2 (My employee); 3 (Co-worker); 4 (Customer client patient); 5 (Friend / acquaintance); 6 (Partner); 7 (My child); 8 (Parent); 9 (Sibling); 10 (other relatives); 11 (other persons)

features.name: interaction_partner4
features.coding:
This interaction partner in the situation has the following relationship to me:
Select one: 1 (Supervisor); 2 (My employee); 3 (Co-worker); 4 (Customer client patient); 5 (Friend / acquaintance); 6 (Partner); 7 (My child); 8 (Parent); 9 (Sibling); 10 (other relatives); 11 (other persons)

features.name: interaction_partner5
features.coding:
This interaction partner in the situation has the following relationship to me:
Select one: 1 (Supervisor); 2 (My employee); 3 (Co-worker); 4 (Customer client patient); 5 (Friend / acquaintance); 6 (Partner); 7 (My child); 8 (Parent); 9 (Sibling); 10 (other relatives); 11 (other persons)

features.name: beh_leadership
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I took the lead.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: beh_criticism
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I criticised others.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: beh_uninvolved
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I did not get involved.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: beh_selfesteem
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I was self-assured.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: beh_unfriendly
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I was unfriendly.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: beh_reserved
features.coding:
During the interaction, I exhibited the following behavior: I was reserved.
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: status_admired
features.coding:
During the interaction I perceived the following: I was admired. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: status_criticised
features.coding:
During the interaction I perceived the following: I was criticised. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

6 = Applies completely

features.name: status_upstaged
features.coding:
During the interaction I perceived the following: Others tried to steal the show from me. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: status_sidelined
features.coding:
During the interaction I perceived the following: I was sidelined. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

6 = Applies completely

features.name: int_pleasure
features.coding: Please use the following sliders to indicate how dissatisfied vs. satisfied you felt overall

features.name: int_activity
features.coding: Please use the following sliders to indicate how calm vs. activated you felt overall

features.name: type_activity
features.coding:
If no interaction took place, the following questions (until occup_activity) are posed. 
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others.
What kind of activity was it?
1 = job-related task/chore
2 = private task/chore
3 = leisure activity

features.name: digital
features.coding:
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others.
The activity evaluated here took place as follows:
1 = on the computer/laptop/tablet/cell phone
2 = not on the computer/laptop/tablet/cell phone

features.name: pleasant
features.coding:
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others. During the activity, I perceived the following: I found the activity pleasant. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: fun
features.coding:
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others. During the activity, I perceived the following: I had fun. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: done
features.coding:
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others. During the activity, I perceived the following: I did tasks that others assigned to me. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: intellectual
features.coding:
Now please answer a few questions about your last completed activity, i.e. the last situation lasting at least 5 minutes in which you did not interact with others. During the activity, I perceived the following: I was intellectually/mentally stimulated. 
1 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies completely

features.name: overwhelmed
features.coding:

6 = Applies completely

features.coding:

features.name: worry_ownhealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my health.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_ownsoclife
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my social life.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_ownstudies
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my university studies.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_healthsystem
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about the healthcare system in Germany.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_soclife
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about the social cohesion in Germany.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_economy
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about the economy/working life in Germany.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_cullife
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about the cultural life in Germany.
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_parentshealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my parents health. If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_grandparentshealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my grandparents health. If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_siblingshealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my siblings' health. If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_partnerhealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my partners' health. If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_friendshealth
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about my close friends' health. If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much

features.name: worry_peoplehealth
features.description: Covid wider social environment health worries
features.coding:
Due to the coronavirus outbreak, I am worried about he health of my wider social environment (fellow university students, other acquaintances). If a question does not apply, it can be omitted. 
1 = Very little
6 = Very much
